metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27347 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Use after free in lzma_decompress_buf function in stream.c in Irzip 0.631allows attackers to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted compressedfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180528-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180528-1+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
